name: Firmament - The Keepers' Bundle
description:
This exquisite 100+ page collection features breathtaking visuals from the game and unveils a treasure trove of concept art, character and object studies, and in-progress art, much of which has previously only been seen by Firmament’s development team during the making of the game!

Lose yourself in the extraordinary beauty and intricate details of Firmament with this one-of-a-kind digital art book!
